      • selectAction

        public Action selectAction(Input i)
        This function initially trains the agent when called the first time. It converts the CaseBase to a tracefile. Gets the feature names, action names, and passes it to the BayesianNetworkRemote(). It then will convert the input into a hashMap of inputs. It will put placeholderValues into the list of inputs so that if there are missing values they will be supplemented by the placeholder. The inputs are then matched with the index of the feature_names so that the correct feature_value is sent as evidence to Matlab. The result is a list of probabilities and the highest is chosen and the corresponding action is returned.
        Overrides:
        selectAction in class Reasoning
        Parameters:
        i - An input
        Returns:
        Action The most probable action
